forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 7C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 41F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
